show_name: Dr. Slump & Arale-chan Hoyoyo!! Tasuketa Same ni Tsurerarete. . . (movie)
other_title: Dr. Slump e Arale - Viaggio in fondo al mare (Italian)
Ｄｒ．スランプ ほよよ!!助けたサメに連れられて (Japanese)
plot: Arale saves a baby shark at the beach and in gratitude the sharks invite she and her family to visit the Underwater Kingdom.
